page.title: 02Recreation
page.content: This is Tiree's{Domesday Book.}So I will tell you about some of the sports and pastimes we play living in the nineteen eighties.In Tiree every Wednesday around about May East,Central and West play football. Each team plays twice and the team with most point is the champion of the island.Hockey is also a popular sport and the girls and women play once a week in the summer.If you have a boat you can go fishing.When the weather is good you can also go swimming but sometimes the wind makes the sea too choppy.
